name: KiGuy
description:
The player is a boy who suddenly wakes up in an underground cave with a rare jumping ability.  

The game mechanics are simple, hold down X to charge up the jump energy, the longer pressed, the higher the character will jump. It has three levels right now,  If I see that people like the game, I'll make a more original and polished version.  

Although the game has its own mechanics, it was initially inspired by Celeste, since it is a game that I really liked and I used it as inspiration to create my first game (this is my first game).

NOTE: The web version the background looks blurry and the audio has lag, I recommend playing it in the native versions.

Enjoy it!
